LanguageData.PhantomAlloy.label: phantom alloy
LanguageData.PhantomAlloy.description: This alloy, purpose-built for elite armor and specialized suits, emerges from a fusion of uranium and fiberglass at precise temperatures. The result is a uniquely durable and non-flammable material, tailored for exclusive use by elite troops. Crafting it demands skilled workers who can maintain precise temperature control.
